page.title: 08MILLBAY 2
page.content: The ferry connection to{Santander}in northern{Spain}is the only direct link from the U.K. to Spain by ferry and so is very important. The recent joining of the{European Economic Community}by Spain and Portugal will mean that the traffic carried as freight will increase as customs duties are relaxed. This can only be good for the Dock and the area around it in terms of creating new jobs . The tourists heading for Spain use the service to save driving hundreds of miles to reach Spain through France .
